title: Dragon Age: Dreadwolf & God of War Ragnarok DLC Rumors - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.25.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Tim and Blessing round out the week talking about Dragon Age Dreadwolf being internally delayed, God of War DLC rumors, and a game ripping off Spider-Man.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:20 - Housekeeping
The first episode of Saw in Review is up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunny.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:59 - Dragon Age Dreadwolf keeps getting delayed internally, report claims
00:25:12 - God of War Ragnarok DLC is Reportedly in the Works
00:32:37 - Last Of Us TV series co-creator has no issue with spin-offs "in principle"
00:38:59 - Baldur’s Gate 3’s first major patch is out now, and its second one is coming soon
00:42:09 - Project Mugen Gamescom Reveal Is Cyberpunk Meets Genshin Impact
00:46:22 - Out Today
00:51:35 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: Greg & Tim

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
